attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: this app i thought would take a minute or two to download.. NO it took literally 4 days.. ridiculous. this app needs to be removed from the app store ASAP!

attributes.title: Are you serious
attributes.review: Literally the worst app of all time, never works and full of bugs, pretty sure I was hacked through it too

attributes.title: WORST THING EVER
attributes.review: i don’t recommend a day after downloading my phone crashed on every app and i couldn’t do anything. literally no texts or call i don’t recommend!!!!!!!

attributes.title: Just horrible
attributes.review: I can even I can’t explain how terrible this app is the worst app I have seen in the App Store ever. Keeps shutting off . Non of the options work. Lags like hell.

attributes.title: Really bad
attributes.review: I got robbed after downloading this and also it’s very glitchy and the news are biased on here. The app turns off after 5 mins.

this app stole all of my data and my credit card got hacked😖😖 and my credit card was used to buy life-sized trump body pillows (in bulk)🤮🤮 they were sent to my house and i am now having to explain to my 80 year old grandmother why an ugly orange nude man covered in an american flag is sitting on her bed🤤🤤 i’m 99.9% positive that it is owned by china😩😩 and is stealing our information😞

attributes.title: Poorly made
attributes.review: Constant glitches. Can’t even see any events or pictures because it keeps glitching!

attributes.title: What is this?
attributes.review: The interface of this thing barely works. Awful experience if I could give it -1 Star I would

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: It takes a whole 24 hours to download and right when i opened it, an app popped up and scammed me!! i now have $0 in my bank account! DONT NOT download. Apple, PLEASE take this down! it is a SCAM!

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER.
attributes.review: Do I even need to explain myself. The whole app is  is trash and should never exist. 🤮🤮 Donald Trump is gross and needs to be banned from the United States. He also spreads hate and looks like a Cheeto. Please take this off the App Store. ☺️✨🧚🏽‍♂️💞🥺🥰🦄
